reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 95/03: SPECIFICATION OF VIRULENT DISEASES
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 95/03: SPECIFICATION OF VIRULENT DISEASES
reg_info.act_under: Health Protection and Promotion Act   Loi sur la protection et la promotion de la santé

content.content: 1. Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome (SARS) is specified as a virulent disease for the purposes of the Act.  O. Reg. 95/03, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome (SARS) is specified as a virulent disease for the purposes of the Act.  O. Reg. 95/03, s. 1.
